body.name: FOTOSOK 8-Tier Media Tower Rack, 11.6 X 9.3 X 70.9 Inches CD DVD Slim Storage Cabinet with Adjustable Shelves, Tall Narrow Bookcase Display Bookshelf for Home Office, Oak
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 25 mins
features: Durability Is Our Top Priority -- Crafted of premium particleboard boards, this media tower rack is well made and offers great durability. The wood look and stylish oak color can match most décor styles and add elegance to your room.

Adjustable DVD Shelf Rack -- This CD media storage cabinet is comparted into 8 small cubes and comes with 4 adjustable shelves that allow you to adjust the height of the shelves according to your needs which provide enough space to sort and store your different CD DVDs.

Versatile CD Media Rack -- Tall and slim size: 11.6L*9.3W*70.9H inches (30*23.5*180 cm), bedroom, living room, kitchen, office all welcome this narrow tower cube rack to help you make your CD DVDs, audios, books, photo frames, pot plants well arranged and easy to reach.

Build Your CD Tower Wall -- Perfect for putting together a collection of your treasured DVDs and CDs to build your own collection and display wall. It can also become your book collection shelf, handicraft display shelf, etc. Help improve your quality of life.

Keep It Simple -- Thanks to the numbered parts, and easy-to-follow instructions, you'll have this DVD storage cabinets without sacrificing much of your leisure time, and find a practical yet unique way to spice up your home.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Build Your Own Exclusive Corner, to Listen, to Feel, to Experience the Beauty and Leisure in Life...

Enjoy a Cozy Time Fotosok Freestanding 8-Tier Media Tower Rack Fotosok focuses on the quality and functionality of the products themselves, aiming to create more practical and beautiful furniture items for customers.Fotosok freestanding 8-Tier Media Tower Rack is a three-in-one collection of storage, display, and grooming to make your life and work more efficient.

Perfect Addition for Display and Storage FOTOSOK 8-Tier Media Tower Rack Oak The modern white color and precise craftsmanship making the media ca tower rack a home essential that combines ornamental display function and practical storage functions.Equipped with an iron sheet, you can choose to install the CD rack against the wall, making your usage more stable.

0.47" Thick Wood Panels Made of particle board of sufficient thickness, sturdy and durable. The CD rack can withstand your enough CDs, ornaments, decorations, etc. Adjustable Shelves Comes with 4 adjustable shelves, each of them has three opsitions to choose. You can adjust the CD rack as your preference. Optional Wall-mounted This CD rack is equipped with wall-mounted device which gives more stability and safety. Very easy to install and remove. 8 tier Media Rack OAK With 8 tier of large capacity, each tier up to 8.33in, you can place most of your CDs, or decorations, handicrafts, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is a miracle. I had this limited space between the wall and a wardrobe and this shelf fits right in. Easy to assemble. Good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Standard particleboard bookshelf
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf was exactly what I expected. It’s your standard particleboard shelf like the kind you would get at IKEA or Walmart. There were no big issues. Everything went together, really smoothly and easily. The thing fits perfectly in the corner of my closet which is an odd skinny space. It gave me a lot more room in the closet. I can store two pairs of shoes in each shelf if I want one pair to basically be resting on the other. Otherwise only one pair goes in at a time and the very tip of the toebox hangs out a little bit. Can also store things like sweaters And some purses but again, the shelf is not very deep and some things hang out a little in the front. Regardless, I’m happy with my purchase, and it gave me a lot of functional space where before there was none.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT for narrow spaces!
reviews.reviewText: This is truly great for narrow spaces. Much better than stacking up books vertically on floor. We used very small amount elmer's school kid glue rubbed on with qtips, inside the dowel holes before attaching. Ended up with a completely sturdy bookcase. Loved it enough that we ordered a second bookcase. (After finding another narrow spot up a wall for books between other furniture. )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Missing Holes for connection screws
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is solid and looks more polished than cheaper versions of this style. It was easy to assemble but there were missing pre-drilled holes for the unique screws that interlock with the top half of the shelf (shelf #3). I was able to remedy this but it required extra tools and time to get the hole placement to align with the top half.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really simple to put together and really good quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great construction - better than you expect
reviews.reviewText: Well designed. Comes with long screws and stronger twist lock cams - which makes it sturdy. Screw and dowels for top, middle, and bottom shelves. Assembles in 2 sections - top and bottom, connected with cam screws. It was such a good product, I bought another!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Overpriced for what it is. The finish is not great. It was packaged pretty well. Fairly easy to assemble. Finishing screws on the back we’re annoying. Not in love with it, but it works in the space where I need it. The stickers look stupid and don’t match the paint, but it was that or the bare screws. There is some gapping. The shelves only have preset placements so unlike many bookshelves, you are very limited in what you can do. There are several inch gaps between main anchor shelves and where the additional adjustable ones can go. If you have a few more inches, I’d just get the smaller Billy bookcase. I didn’t quite have enough room for the smaller one next to my big one. I wish I did, but I’m about 3 inches short on room. Not worth the hassle of returning when this will work how I need it to for now. Could be so much better though & kind of a letdown.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very sturdy and great value for what I paid, looks great in the entry way of the house
